option.name: template
option.value: public java.lang.String toString() { #if ( $members.size() > 0 ) #set ( $i = 0 ) return "{" + #foreach( $member in $members ) #set ( $i = $i + 1 ) #if ( $i == $members.size() ) #set ( $postfix = "+" ) #else #set ( $postfix = "+ "", "" + " ) #end #if ( $member.collection ) "\"$member.name\":" + ($member.accessor == null ? "null" : java.util.Arrays.toString($member.accessor .toArray())) $postfix #elseif ( $member.objectArray ) "\"$member.name\":" + java.util.Arrays.toString($member.accessor) $postfix #elseif ( $member.primitiveArray ) "\"$member.name\":" + java.util.Arrays.toString($member.accessor) $postfix #elseif ( $member.object ) "\"$member.name\":" + ($member.accessor == null ? "null" : "\"" + $member.accessor + "\"" ) $postfix #else "\"$member.name\":\"" + $member.accessor + "\"" $postfix #end #end "}"; #else return "{\"_class\":\"$classname\"}"; #end }
